text: Maurizio Thermes (born August 14, 1939 in Rome) is a retired Italian professional football player. His professional debut game for A.S. Roma in the 1958/59 season remained the only Serie A game in his career. ==External links== *Profile at Enciclopediadelcalcio Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:S.S. title: Maurizio Thermes
